author: jerenkrantz
msg: - allow user to tweak max outstanding requests (illustrates memory usage)
- use iovec bucket primitives for optimizations
(ignore_all_cert_errors): No functional changes - fix up whitespace.
(main): Set max_outstanding_requests based on -x argument; use stdout for

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix up some whitespace issues.  No functional changes.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix one of my long-standing itches with a pool allocation that simply needs a
pstrcatv that can work off of a bucket allocator instead.
(serf_bstrcatv): Think apr_pstrcatv but with a bucket.
(serf_bucket_simple_own_create): Helper function for a simple bucket that
doesn't do a copy of the data.

author: gstein
msg: * CHANGES: fix typo. h/t to danielsh.
